title: Proven System
description: We use this exact system to grow Koi Roofing and Solar. Every strategy we offer has been tested on our own company first — not theory, real results.

title: Contractor-Owned
description: We're not marketers who 'specialize' in home services. We're contractors who figured out marketing. Big difference. We know your business because we run one.

title: Free Website (Annual Plans)
description: Sign up for an annual plan and get a lightning-fast website built, hosted, and maintained by us. Faster than your competition, optimized to convert visitors into calls.

title: No Fluff, Just Results
description: We don't sell vanity metrics or pretty reports. We track what matters — leads, booked jobs, and revenue. If it doesn't make you money, we don't do it.

title: Veteran-Owned
description: Discipline, reliability, and follow-through aren't buzzwords to us. We show up, do the work, and deliver on what we promise. Every time.
